description: Retrieves the status of a specified query.

parameters.name: graphIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Neptune Analytics graph.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The ID of the query in question.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the query in question.

nested_items.name: waited
nested_items.description: Indicates how long the query waited, in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: elapsed
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds the query has been running.
